articles.title: Spinner Ashwin retires from India duty
articles.description: India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin retires from international cricket at the age of 38.

articles.author: Stephan Shemilt
articles.title: England arrive at judgement day for Bazball
articles.description: The tour of New Zealand begins a defining year for England under Ben Stokes and Brendon McCullum, writes chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
articles.content:
In Christchurch, the city of his birth, Stokes is born again. Physically fit and back to his ebullient self. 
As usual, he politely fends off suggestions that this is a homecoming - "I'm English" - … [+1960 chars]

articles.title: Prithvi Shaw: The rise and fade of Indian cricket's wonder boy
articles.description: It has been a steep fall for the 25-year-old batter, once hailed as Indian cricket's 'next big thing'.
articles.content:
Prithvi Shaw went unsold in the IPL auction in November
Last month, Rishabh Pant became the most expensive player in the history of the Indian Premier League (IPL) as he was signed by Lucknow SuperG… [+6049 chars]

articles.title: Commentator Isa Guha sorry for calling cricketer 'primate'
articles.description: Guha apologises after her remark about Indian cricketer Jasprit Bumrah caused a backlash.
articles.content:
Cricket commentator Isa Guha has apologised for calling Indian bowler Jasprit Bumrah the "most valuable primate" during the third Test against Australia.
She made the remark while commentating for F… [+2286 chars]

articles.title: England close on victory in first Test against New Zealand
articles.description: England are on course for victory in the first Test against New Zealand after Chris Woakes' crucial two wickets in two balls on the third day in Christchurch.
articles.content:
